actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Water, Fisheries, and Wildlife. Hearings held.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water, Fisheries, and Wildlife. Approved for full committee consideration with amendments favorably.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Drinking Water, Fisheries, and Wildlife

official_title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to impose a moratorium on the listing of species as endangered or threatened and the designation of critical habitat in order to ensure that constitutionally protected private property rights are not infringed, and for other purposes.
short_title: Endangered Species Listing Moratorium Act of 1995

summary.text: Endangered Species Listing Moratorium Act of 1995 - Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior, during the period beginning on March 7, 1995, and ending on September 7, 1995, from: (1) determining that a species is endangered or threatened; or (2) designating a habitat of a species as a critical habitat.

titles.title: Endangered Species Listing Moratorium Act of 1995

A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to impose a moratorium on the listing of species as endangered or threatened and the designation of critical habitat in order to ensure that constitutionally protected private property rights are not infringed, and for other purposes.
